instance.name: boolean_expansion
instance.description: All instances from all genes in result

instance.name: all_ortholog_groups
instance.description: Number of ortholog groups across available species (the representative gene is: %%primaryOrthoOrganism%% if it exists, otherwise %%secondaryOrthoOrganism%% if it exists, else the others in alphabetical order).

instance.name: toxo_genes
instance.description: Number of non-redundant T. gondii genes (strains: ME49, GT1 and VEG).

instance.name: tbr_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of non-redundant T.brucei genes (strains: TREU927, 427 and gambiense).

instance.name: tc_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of non-redundant T.cruzi genes (strains: esmeraldo and non-esmeraldo, and unassigned).

instance.name: pgra_instances
instance.description: Puccinia graminis f. sp. tritici CRL 75-36-700-3 genes.
instance.paramValue: Puccinia graminis f. sp. tritici CRL 75-36-700-3

instance.name: tce_instances
instance.description: All Trypanosoma cruzi CL Brener esmeraldo-like results

instance.name: tcne_instances
instance.description: All Trypanosoma cruzi CL Brener non-esmeraldo-like results

instance.name: tcu_instances
instance.description: All Trypanosoma cruzi results which were not designated "esmeraldo-like" or "non-esmeraldo-like"

instance.name: deprecated_instances
instance.description:
Giardia lamblia ATCC 50803 deprecated genes.
These are previously annotated genes that newer annotation has shown to have insufficient evidence.

instance.name: assemblage_a_instances
instance.description: Giardia lamblia ATCC 50803 (both deprecated and undeprecated) genes.

instance.name: gt1_instances
instance.description: Number of Tg GT1 results (includes redundant instances of some genes)

instance.name: me49_instances
instance.description: Number of Tg ME49 results (includes redundant instances of some genes)

instance.name: veg_instances
instance.description: Number of Tg VEG results (includes redundant instances of some genes)

instance.name: rh_instances
instance.description: Number of Tg RH results (includes redundant instances of some genes)

instance.name: all_min_gt1
instance.description: T. gondii genes without a GT1 result

instance.name: all_min_me49
instance.description: T. gondii genes without a ME49 result

instance.name: all_min_veg
instance.description: T. gondii genes without a VEG result

instance.name: gt1_min_me49
instance.description: Genes that have a GT1 result but not an ME49 result

instance.name: gt1_min_veg
instance.description: Genes that have a GT1 result but not a VEG result

instance.name: me49_min_gt1
instance.description: Genes that have an ME49 result but not a GT1 result

instance.name: me49_min_veg
instance.description: Genes that have an ME49 result but not a VEG result

instance.name: veg_min_gt1
instance.description: Genes that have a VEG result but not a GT1 result

instance.name: veg_min_me49
instance.description: Genes that have a VEG result but not an ME49 result

instance.name: gt1_int_me49
instance.description: Genes that have both GT1 and ME49 results

instance.name: gt1_int_veg
instance.description: Genes that have both GT1 and VEG results

instance.name: me49_int_veg
instance.description: Genes that have both ME49 and VEG results
